Make sure to update your notification settings to receive your notifications on Slack.

Please enter your slack incoming webhook URLs that can be created and found here. You can add as many as you want and specify which notification type is sent to which Slack channel. The channel name is only for your identification and does not play a role in the actual notificationn.
